SECTION_CONTENT:
Flinn Suggested Chemical Storage Pattern: Inorganic #1. Store with metals and metal hydrides.
Always store under dry oil (kerosene or mineral oil). Store in a glass bottle inside a Flinn Saf-Stor™™ can, in a cool, dry place.
